CustomField.formula: IF( CreatedDate >= ADDMONTHS( NOW() ,-12), CreatedDate, IF( Application_In_Date_Time__c >= ADDMONTHS( NOW() ,-12), Application_In_Date_Time__c, IF( Ready_To_Submit_Date_Time__c >= ADDMONTHS( NOW() ,-12), Ready_To_Submit_Date_Time__c, CreatedDate )))
CustomField.label: Created / CPR Date
